source_objects.title: Pet Care & Training
source_objects.description: Learn the best kept secrets in pet care and pet training: dogs, cats, rabbits, horses, fish and many more.

items.title: Cat essentials: Litter box

visible_instructors.title: Constance Boehle
visible_instructors.name: Constance
visible_instructors.job_title: Cat on the Couch® – holistic cat therapist

items.headline: Learn all about perfect cat toilet management and how to solve the most common litter box issues.
objectives_summary: implement perfect cat toilet management
reduce stress for their felines during litter box usage
and find solutions for common litter box issues

items.title: Dog Training - Tricks Level 1
items.headline: Clicker train your dog to perform 8 fun tricks plus a bonus trick.
objectives_summary: By the end of your course, your dog will be able to perform the following tricks:
Spin
Sit Pretty

items.title: Animal Communication made EASY
items.headline: Learn how to communicate successfully with your furry friends
objectives_summary: You will learn what it needs to be a good animal communicator
You will learn how to communicate with animals
You will learn how animals feel and see the world

items.title: Dog Training: 50 Common Dog Behaviors & Ways to fix them

visible_instructors.title: Aman Gupta
visible_instructors.name: Aman
visible_instructors.job_title: UX Expert, Pet Lover  & Technology Enthusiast

items.headline: Dog Behavior & Dog Training Masterclass! Ways to fix 50 dog behaviors using Punishment Free Dog Training Techniques!
objectives_summary: In this dog behavior masterclass, you will get a thorough understanding of your dog's behaviors and you will also learn punishment free training techniques to manage and correct these behaviors.
Basic Obedience Dog Training commands like Sit, Stay, Come, Drop it, Lie Down, Go to place, Leave,  etc.

Aggression Issues like Interdog Aggression, Aggression towards his family, Territorial, Predatory Aggression, Pain-induced Aggression, Dominance Aggression etc. and what can you do to manage these aggressive behaviors in your dog

items.title: 101 ACTUAL HORSE TRAINING and RIDING:  THE START
items.headline: What every rider or horse lover MUST know
objectives_summary: You'll have a permanent written standard with which to discern a correctly-going-horse.   You’ll be able to identify and avoid counterfeit training and riding.
You’ll have understanding of the mechanical aim and the required elements in a forward, through-going horse and principles needed for a fruitful training plan.
You’ll discern riding and training that’s only ‘partly’ right; you’ll spot a good way-of-going. You’ll know a ‘made’ or ‘finished' horse when you see one.

items.title: Natural & Holistic Pet Care (Dog, Cat Health Training - P2)

visible_instructors.title: Nikki Brown
visible_instructors.name: Nikki
visible_instructors.job_title: Natural Dog Whisperer at Canine Angel

items.headline: Learn how to improve your animal's health & lifestyle using Natural & Holistic Protocols
objectives_summary: Improve your knowledge about holistic health care for animals so you can prevent and treat imbalances without nasty side effects.
Grasp why it is important to question anything that is to be administer to your animal, so you can make informed choices to the best possible treatment for your pet.
Expand your Vaccine knowledge so you can feel confident about knowing the risks involved.

items.title: Dog; Cat; Puppies; Raw Food Natural Diet Certificate Course
items.headline: Dog, Cat, Raw Food, BARF Nutrition Course
objectives_summary: Learn About Dog, Cat, Nutritional Needs
Learn About Raw Food Diet
Learn about the BARF diet

items.title: How to Enjoy Stress-free Dog Walks - The LIVE seminar
items.headline: How to go from stressed out dog walker to safe
objectives_summary: How to control your excited dog on a walk
How to stop your dog pulling on the lead
How to stop your dog from chasing dogs, rabbits, birds.

items.title: 102 Definitions of Terms in Horse Training - GLOSSARY
items.headline: Pre-requisite for all riders and horse trainers and a specific Pre-requisite for RLC Course 2020 (to be published 2020)
objectives_summary: You' ll be given horse-training terminology,  per classical, military, and FEI standards.    The Bibliography of these standards will also be provided..

items.title: Successful Russian Tortoise Care and Husbandry

visible_instructors.title: Ernie Johnson
visible_instructors.name: Ernie
visible_instructors.job_title: Information Technology Pro -  Long Time Tortoise Keeper

items.headline: Discover The  Four Levels of Successful Husbandry, Indoor and Outdoor Pens, Diet, Health, and How to Breed them.
objectives_summary: Discover where the Russian Tortoise comes from in the wild and why it's so important
Learn why the Topography drives the pen requirements
Learn why the Geology of their native environment drives their specific diet requirements

items.title: DOG Fleas & Ticks NATURAL HOME REMEDIES Prevention+Treatment
items.headline: Natural Inexpensive Home Remedies. Essential Oils. Herbalism. Minerals. Dog Care. Dog Protection. Dog Love. Dog Grooming
objectives_summary: Natural Remedies To Protect Your Dog, Your Home And You From Fleas And Ticks
Dosages And Formulas You Will Prepare Natural Remedies For Your Dogs and You
How And Where To Apply Natural Home Remedies

items.title: Horse Care 101 - Equine Encounters Of The First Kind
items.headline: A Beginners Guide
objectives_summary: Students will be able to confidently care for a horse and make important ownership decisions

items.headline: Easy-to-use dog training methods that don't require any experience or expertise
objectives_summary: Prevent & resolve behavior and temperament problems
Put behavior on cue and motivate your dog to want to listen to you

items.title: Attention Games for Dogs: In the Streets
items.headline: Get your dog's attention, anywhere, anytime, with no extra effort and while having fun!
objectives_summary: Teach your dog to be attentive, anywhere, anytime
Get amazing focus!
Have fun with your dog with easy-to-teach games

items.title: Dog Training - Stop fear of Fireworks + Loud sounds
items.headline: If your dog has fear issues related to sounds then this is the course for you. Learn how to train you dog at home.
objectives_summary: by the end of this course you will be able to identify sound phobia in your pet and implement the therapy to treat your pets phobia
What is fear and how it effects your pet
How fear develop into phobias

items.title: Herbalism : Herbs For Dogs
items.headline: Learn All About Which Herbs Are Healthy For Your Dog & How To Use Them
objectives_summary: Learn how herbs can be safely incorporated into your dog's diet for excellent health benefits
Learn how to make tinctures, teas, herbal infused oils and broths, salves, poultices and herbal dog treats
Learn in detail which herbs are safe for your dog & learn the benefits each herb
